description:
More than a year after its release, The Avengers is still proving powerful as it conquered the 39th annual Saturn Awards Wednesday night.

The superhero spectacle racked up four honors from the Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy & Horror Films including best science-fiction film, supporting actor (Clark Gregg), best director (Joss Whedon) and best special effects.

In other movie categories, Life of Pi won for best fantasy film, best horror/thriller went to The Cabin in the Woods and Skyfall was honored for best action/adventure film.

Breaking Bad led all TV shows with three Saturn Awards: best presentation on television, best actor (Bryan Cranston, who tied with The Following's Kevin Bacon) and best supporting actor on television (Jonathan Banks). The Walking Dead won for best cable/syndicated series and best supporting actress on television (Laurie Holden).

The organization paid tribute to the late Richard Matheson, who was scheduled to attend, but passed away from natural causes on Sunday, June 23rd.

沪江娱乐：2013年第39届美国电影电视土星奖公布了获奖名单。电影方面，《复仇者联盟》获得了包括年度最佳电影在内的四项大奖，《少年派的奇幻漂流》获得最佳奇幻电影，詹妮弗·劳伦斯凭借《饥饿游戏》再摘影后；电视方面，《绝命毒师》和《行尸走肉》成为大赢家。

下面是第39届土星奖完整获奖名单：

FILM AWARDS 电影方面
Best Science Fiction Film: Marvel’s The Avengers
最佳科幻电影：《复仇者联盟》
Best Fantasy Film: Life of Pi
最佳奇幻电影：《少年派的奇幻漂流》
Best Horror/Thriller Film: The Cabin in the Woods
最佳恐怖电影：《林中小屋》
Best Action/Adventure Film: Skyfall
最佳动作惊险电影：《007：天降杀机》
Best Actor: Matthew McConaughey (Killer Joe)
最佳男演员：马修·麦康纳《杀手乔》
Best Actress: Jennifer Lawrence (The Hunger Games)
最佳女演员：詹妮弗·劳伦斯《饥饿游戏》
Best Supporting Actor: Clark Gregg (Marvel’s The Avengers)
最佳男配角：克拉克·格雷格《复仇者联盟》
Best Supporting Actress: Anne Hathaway (The Dark Knight Rises)
最佳女配角：安妮·海瑟薇《黑暗骑士崛起》
Best Performance by a Younger Actor: Suraj Sharma (Life of Pi)
最佳年轻演员：苏拉·沙玛《少年派的奇幻漂流》
Best Director: Joss Whedon (Marvel’s The Avengers)
最佳导演：乔斯·温登《复仇者联盟》
Best Writing: Quentin Tarantino (Django Unchained)
最佳编剧：昆汀·塔伦蒂诺《被解救的姜戈》
Best Production Design: Dan Hennah (The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey)
最佳美术执导：丹《霍比特人：意外之旅》
Best Editing: Alexander Berner (Cloud Atlas)
最佳剪辑：亚历山大·伯纳《云图》
Best Music: Danny Elfman (Frankenweenie)
最佳音乐：丹尼·叶夫曼《科学怪狗》
Best Costume: Paco Delgado (Les Miserables)
最佳服装：柏高·德尔加多《悲惨世界》
Best Make-Up: Heike Merker, Daniel Parker, Jeremy Woodhead (Cloud Atlas)
最佳化妆：《云图》
Best Special Effects: Janek Sirrs, Jeff White, Guy Williams, Dan Sudick (Marvel’s The Avengers)
最佳特效：《复仇者联盟》
Best Independent Film Release: Killer Joe
最佳独立电影：《杀手乔》
Best International Film: Headhunters
最佳国际电影：《猎头游戏》
Best Animated Film: Frankenweenie
最佳动画片：《科学怪狗》

TELEVISION AWARDS 电视方面
Best Network Television Series: “Revolution”
最佳网络电视系列：《灭世》
Best Syndicated/Cable Television Series: “The Walking Dead”
最佳有线电视系列：《行尸走肉》
Best Presentation on Television: “Breaking Bad”
最佳电视表现奖：《绝命毒师》
Best Youth-Oriented Series on Television: “Teen Wolf”
最佳面向青年电视：《少狼》
Best Actor on Television: Bryan Cranston (“Breaking Bad”), Kevin Bacon (“The Following”)
电视类最佳男演员：布兰恩·克兰斯顿《绝命毒师》，凯文·贝肯《杀手之王》
